vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a Specific Use Permit for an attached non-premise district activity videoboard sign on property zoned Planned Development District No. 619, on the northwest side of Elm Street, east of Akard Street
Recommendation of Staff and CPC:  Approval for a six-year period, subject to conditions
Z190-370(ND)
